website_summaries.verdict: If you are new to using a food dehydrator and want an entry-level option, this affordable model is the one to try.
pros: An inexpensive dehydrator that's very easy to use
Has 5 roomy trays and an uncomplicated knob control
Doesn't take up a lot of storage space
cons: Not as durable as some pricier competitors
Some units didn't heat up properly

customer_reviews.title: Using it as a 3D filament dryer
customer_reviews.text: Temp settings are fairly accurate on the dial. It works well for drying PLA, PETG and ABS(the only filament types I have at this time). The grid cuts off the stacking rings easily and I can fit 2-1kg spools inside of it
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have made many snacks in here! My favorite to date are dehydrated mushroom chips and mushroom jerky. Some reviews before I bought this product said it’s hard to clean but I have had nothing but a good experience. I spray the racks with oil before placing food on them and this prevents any sticking. If anything gets a little messier than usual like these tomatoes I just grabbed a dollar store toothbrush to help me clean hard to reach corners. It really has been very easy and rewarding to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it is useless.
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not heat up at all. It states on the machine that it goes to 180 degrees F, but it only gets to 120F. I was going to use it as a filament dryer, but it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sheff

customer_reviews.title: Never goes past 127 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Giving this dehydrator 3 stars because it kinda works. Even though the temperature range is 95-158 it never goes past 127 on the bottom tray and a little over 100 on the top tray. It’s good for fruit and vegetables but I wouldn’t use it to do meat jerky. I got it for $35 so wasn’t expecting the world. I will buy a commercial one next time. If you want to try dehydrating then this will work but if you want something better skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: BrinVlogs

customer_reviews.title: Nice appliance
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter appliance. Very easy to use and works well. It’s a little on the small size, but that was what I wanted. Approximately one large cut fruit fits per tray. I’m happy with how the fruits I used turned out since this was my first time experimenting with a dehydrator.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality- Buy Another Brand
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning my second dehydrator. 4 of the 5 trays cracked and separted from the lips of the trays after only my second use. I retuned the first dehydrator because one of the trays was missing about 2 inches of the lip and was cracked. Poor quality and I have the hassle of doing another return.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I shouldnt have ordered this
customer_reviews.text: I returned it after I read that electric heat drying destroys vitamins. I shouldn't have ordered it not free return.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: 21 bell peppers dehydrated in 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: Love the dehydrator - added two trays from my old one, which had no temperature control and no fan - have to admit it was over 30 years old. This new one is a gem, will use it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Tomv

customer_reviews.title: Good for filament drying
customer_reviews.text: I use it to dry filament for 3D printing, works great 👍. Have to be careful when you cut the centers out of the trays, I cracked the last ring when I was cutting them out. Luckily I don't need all the trays for my spools to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Wired by chimps - heat element was not connected.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for Xmas, and finally got around to using in, on account of the pending apocalypse. Luckily I decided to test run some apples, while the meat we prepped for jerky marinated. It ran half the day before I realized it wasn't heating, only blowing air. I opened it up and was able to locate the problem - the wires were not connected. They had been twisted together poorly and came apart when the cap was sloppily jammed on top. I was able to get it working, but I'm now wary of leaving it unattended. The last thing I need during this apocalypse is a "This is Us" scenario.
customer_reviews.author: MisterG

customer_reviews.title: Great 3d printer filament dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how well this works for dehydrating food since I will never use mine for that, but it is great for dehydrating 3d printer filament. What's interesting is it is essentially identical to what the PrintDry Filament Drying System v1 uses. It does not have the lazy susan inside or holes in the side to print from it, and you have to cut the trays to get the spools to fit, but it also does not cost the $125 the PrintDry costs. So, for around than the cost of 2 spools you can get something that does the same job as something costing 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: STu

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for a person starting to dehydrate foods. It comes with some good trays as well You can dehydrate plenty of food items with this. And it's easy to use and doesn't require much space.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat up. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: You ever realize how you don't see the bad reviews till you go to write your own? Like others on here that I somehow missed before, my unit doesn't heat up. It takes forever for it to simply dry itself after rinsing. My return window has closed but I would have sent this back had infested it as soon as I got it. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Heath Smith

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE MACHINE BUT MY ONLY COMPLAINT IS I CAN ...
customer_reviews.text: MY FIRST MACHINE TO DEHYDRATE, I LOVE THE MACHINE BUT MY ONLY COMPLAINT IS I CAN NOT FIND SHEETS TO FIT THE TRAYS. HAD TO BUY ANOTHER BRAND THAT DOES NOT FIT THE HOLES IN TRAY. SO THE SHEETS LAY WOBBLEY IN TRAY, NOT EVEN.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Mae

customer_reviews.title: It gets warm, temperatures seem to be accurate, and doesn't cost much.
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use it to dry 3d printing filament, but sometimes to dry peppers. the better homes and gardens cake carrier top fits well over the base plate which can fit two 1kg spools. It came with fine mesh and solid plates to do small stuff and dry out liquids. Middle air temperate matches my little digital kitchen probe within 1C. The feet are just plastic Xes so it vibrates a lot and is kind of loud if it is not sitting on a sound absorbent material. Also it was cheap and adjustable which is the biggest selling point...
customer_reviews.author: J. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: It's a 3-star for me.
customer_reviews.text: It takes longer to dry the fruits and vegetables, I thought it could be a little more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: shannon a brown

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job of dehydrating, but noisy and hot.
customer_reviews.text: When we received this dehydrator, we threw away one that was over 10 years old and falling apart. The old one did not have a circulating fan, it just used low radiant heat. It was quiet and did not emit much heat. This new Rosewill unit has a fan that we can hear throughout our house and it emits hot air that is not welcome here in the desert except in the winter. We are keeping it and planning to do all of our vegetable and fruit drying in the fall and winter. One other thing, the lid does not fit well on the stacked trays. It is probably 2 mm too large in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Dries the fruit very well and i love how fast it dried them. My other ones took a full day and night. Using it took only about half the day.
customer_reviews.author: S. George

customer_reviews.title: Good for dehydrating filament, although fan can be a little loud
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, like most people, for dehydrating my 3D printing filament and it works well. Do note I made my own "tray" to allow me to run the filament out from the dehydrator and to the printer while saving the original trays in case I want to use it as originally intended! I did knock a star off since not long after purchasing the fan inside did get a bit louder, although it still functions just fine, it is a little annoying! Overall still a good deal and it has more than paid for itself in keeping PVA, Nylon and PETG filament dry during critical prints.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Does the drying job well.
customer_reviews.text: Used asap. Very quiet. Made beef jerky. It held about 2.5 lbs of meet and had dry in 6 hours. Does it's job
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: using this to dry 3d printing filament
customer_reviews.text: Tested the temps before drying any filament. My unit get very accurate and consistent temps (measured with several thermapens) throughout the enclosed volume. It does take about 20-30 min for temps to stabilize, but once there the temps only varied +/-3deg F for 11hrs. That's good enough for my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: customer 5492053

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fruits and Veggies
customer_reviews.text: Quick and high quality. We used it to make pepper flakes and mango strips so far!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley F.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a 3D printing Filament Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Having to cut out the trays for the filament rolls was a pain, but expected. Found a mini-small tooth saw worked best and didnt crack the rest of the tray. The temperature is right on the mark. The only Con I have at the moment is that when it starts up it rattles some. Once it warms up it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stange

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for cheap dehydrator.
customer_reviews.text: This last maybe 2 months. This is not even a good cheap option.
customer_reviews.author: AMZNCust007

customer_reviews.title: i dry the winter melon or chinese wax gourd
customer_reviews.text: it is our first use, and it did pretty good job to dry up a 20 pound winter melon. It takes about 24 hours to complete the job. I used to sun dry the chinese wax gourd, and the result is okay but if the sun is too hot there is some burn on the end result. The Dehydrator machine get a very consistant result. I grow about 20 to 25 winter melons and this machine would help me to dry it out for use later
customer_reviews.author: WooWood

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive filament dryer
customer_reviews.text: I modified the trays so that I could fit 2 spools of nylon filament for 3d printing. at half the cost of an almost identical filament dryer. It works very well!
customer_reviews.author: H. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Trays DO need to be rotated.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to make jerky, dried fruits and dried herbs. It was a bit loud and a total pain to clean. It did in fact need the trays rotated as the bottom got too dry and the top still wet. But if you watch it, and have a dishwasher then it works Good.
customer_reviews.author: yates7265

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to make a filament dryer great value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm doing a project on my youtube channel using this dehydrator. It's made by the same company that makes filament dryers and look identical, but at greatly increased prices. So far the unit is working very well but im sure i have now voided the warranty ? LOL
customer_reviews.author: SFXPHIL

customer_reviews.title: Great for dehydrating 3d printing filament.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for dehydrating 3d printing filament. Simply cut the trays out and glued the rims together. Fits 2 x 1kg spools plus desiccant. Works well. Temperature is good.
customer_reviews.author: AdamA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preserving food
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for drying herbs,fruits veggies the possibilities are endless,nice quality
customer_reviews.author: michelle giddings

customer_reviews.title: Rubbing loud fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use for 3D printer filament. out of the box the fan was dragging on the housing making it very very loud. Clearly these things aren’t tested. The housing under the fan was warped up into the fan. Took it apart, heated it up with a heat gun and straightened it out and was fine after that.
customer_reviews.author: Tkc

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product and company
customer_reviews.text: I liked how it dehydrated my fruit until the heating coil went out and stopped working. Then tried to get ahold of the company to see about replacemant parts or replacing it. The compay never contacted me back to help or anything. Bunch of ass holes. Dont get this product. The coil stopped working after 2 months of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's east to use but when you try meat in it it's a fail. Doesn't get hot enough. Maybe it would be ok for fruit or vegetables. But I'm not keeping it. Out it goes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sparke

customer_reviews.title: Great Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and I used it all summer to dehydrate my broccoli, cauliflower, and Brussel sprout leaves to use in soups and stews during winter. It’s great for dehydrating wild mushrooms
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. The temp control is very handy. I only have dries Carolina reapers but plan to do jerky soon. Seems like it would work well with what ever you decide to use it for. The instructions give you tips for different settings uses etc. Comes with some plastic inserts / covers that would work well with different setups.
customer_reviews.author: Trent S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little food dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: If you are not doing industrial-scale food dehydration this is a great unit for home use. The stacking tray cylindrical design is easy to load, restack top to bottom to dry uniformly, and to clean. Fan is quiet. Temperature setting appears to be accurate. Drying time of fruits was consistent with numerous online sources for fruit-dehydrating info and recommendations. Not sure why anyone would pay higher prices for other dehydrators when this one works so well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edward

customer_reviews.title: Works for drying 3d printing filament!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this for dehydrating food, but I use it to dry my 3d printing filament. For that purpose it works really well and was an excellent price. The temperature control seems to work fairly well and it really has improved my print quality with PETG and nylon filaments.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Dino

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to handle
customer_reviews.text: After using it about three or four times the racks started to crack, Became brittle, and ending up breaking apart. I contacted Amazon and they were supposed to contact the company but nobody got back with me. All my racks are broken and they do not work now because it could not withstand the suggested temperature in the directions apparently.
customer_reviews.author: EraLeta C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this dehydrator!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to dry my royal icing on my sugar cookies. It works beautifully. I have bought 2 because my business required it. I need another and the company says unavailable. I love this machine so much, I don't want to buy another brand, so I will wait! Love Love Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sufficient
customer_reviews.text: I used this to dry up some herbs, it took 17 hours to what I thought it dried! Went to use the herbs yesterday and they were molded!!!!!! I had to throw all my hard work for the year in the trash!!!! Lost all my herbs even after 17 hours of drying!!
customer_reviews.author: A12

customer_reviews.title: Use it for baking audio and video tapes.
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine to bake audio and video tapes that suffer from "sticky shed syndrome." It works like a champ. It can hold 7-inch and 10.5-inch reels, as well as VHS, Beta, and audio cassettes. It's like it was made for the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: ScottWGrammer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for drying out 3d printer filament!
customer_reviews.text: Not what it was meant for, but after using my dremel with a cutting wheel and removing all the insides of the trays it works great! Can fit two rolls at a time for drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: cracked tray after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy again. After 5 months 3 trays are cracked and can’t be used. Unable to buy new trays.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hodge

customer_reviews.title: The Cheapest Jerky Making Machine you'll find
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one purpose. Making Beef Jerky...! It worked great. Using all 5 trays completely filled it took about 2 hours longer then suggest. I highly recommend this for the low price, you do get your money's worth..
customer_reviews.author: JOHN 'Metal GeeZer' CAYTON

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Gear product does exactly what I needed to do. Temperature pretty accurate haven’t had to go above 130 though. Says dishwasher safe I would NOT recommend putting the trays in. They came out warped still usable but no longer a sturdy stacked seal. Luckily I only put 2 in but Bc of this I gave it 4 stars Bc they are not easy to clean thoroughly by hand.
customer_reviews.author: S Warren

customer_reviews.title: Decent but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Did great with jerky and grapes. I give it a 4 because the heat escapes and uses more energy and requires longer dehydration times. Next time I'll be buying a box version. It's the item itself that is the issue. Product was greatly packaged, and clean upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn McBride

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: easy to use easy to clean and makes great apple chips
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Horner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Cannot use.
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed in this product. I want to return it. It takes WAY TOO LONG to dehydrate food. Has been running for two days to get some okra and some basil. Still not Dry. I was doing better with drying food in oven. It's eating up electricity and not completing the job. Please advise how to return this product to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it went to a higher temp for making jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: SO AWESOME 😍!
customer_reviews.text: I sliced around 5-6 apples sprinkled some cinnamon and I can't stop eating them. Beef jerky is next. I'll keep you posted on it's job!
customer_reviews.author: domecq

customer_reviews.title: Great dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: I find that this is a great beginner dehydrator. I use for herbs and I love it. It’s quiet and easy to clean, with on and off and temperature indicator.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Home Made Jerky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make home made beef and turkey jerky. This is so easy to use. And I get to seaon my jerky the way I want. A great product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Is as described. I find it works very well, better than I expected. It is built better than expected. The temp control is not digital so its a lil wonky. That being said- it is consistent once you know where it needs to be. NOTE....If you buy extra trays or tray accessories really pay attention to sizes. Similar dehydrators may look the same but will not fit without modifications
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery and I use it every day. I must have dried out a hundred pineapples. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kathy negri

customer_reviews.title: 3d printing must-have
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this food dehydrator to dry out 3d printing filament, and it's been absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great for dehydrated apples!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. New to dehydration and this was perfect. Perfect price and easy to use and clean. Crunchy apples with using only two trays. Less crunchy the more trays used. Either way, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MMMLMM

customer_reviews.title: Bad out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it in the mail today. Took it out of the box and set it up. Turned it on and left it for 2 hours. When I came back to check on it, it was still blowing cold air. Apparently, it seems to have a faulty heating element. Guess that's what you get for $30. I just expected something that worked the way it was supposed to from an "Amazon's Choice" product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Minchokovich

customer_reviews.title: Dehydrator 2020
customer_reviews.text: It dried all the herbs I put in it. What can I say, it was everything I expected from a dehydrator. Blows more hot air than a politician running for reelection and at longer intervals. There, I said what we were all thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica House

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Fan keeps getting loose and device is vey noisy. Opened it up to check problem and assembly is really bad. Fan is not properly secured to motor shaft and after a few hours falls to the bottom and begins making a very annoying sound.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Amado

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to preserve food!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and dried tomatoes, jalapenos, mushrooms, zucchini, bell peppers, leekes and even kale chips....all dried beautifully in this dehydrator......Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lawanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed this one for a low temperature and it sure delivered. Perfect for what I needed it for. Very easy to clean and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Easily breaks apart
customer_reviews.text: After having this dehydrator for only a couple of months, the trays started breaking apart. I don’t know why but when I would pick up a tray, even gently, it would crack and break apart. Wish these trays would last longer... we were really enjoying dehydrating foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: Solid dehydrator! Allowed me to make fried fruit and save alot of money.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Nice dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Dried every thing I put in it. Did it in a reasonable amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months before giving a review... This product works excellently to this point.. Would recommend... I used it for my dried candied snacks
customer_reviews.author: SunneShynne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a dehydrator, and used it all the time. We had to sell it when we moved back to the US because we didn’t have space in our luggage. This one is great! Not small, but very easy to clean and use! We dehydrate on the regular now, which helps us waste less food and enjoy different textures.
customer_reviews.author: Helberth Morales

customer_reviews.title: Poor trays
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! While the fan on the unit is great along with a temperature control....the plastic trays are too thin. After 3 uses..each tray is cracked. I had a different brand for over 10 years until the motor died. Never had any trays break! Don't waste your money on this one
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Even a kid can use it
customer_reviews.text: Got thus so my 13 year old grandson could make beef jerky in
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Redman

customer_reviews.title: I tried strawberries (which are NOT in the guide) because ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried strawberries (which are NOT in the guide) because that is the ONLY reason I bought this and it didn't work. It didn't seem to get hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Trays are made of plastic, easily cracks then break.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that I’ve had this appliance less than two months when the trays started to crack on the sides then break. The bottom of the trays are falling out. This allows the food to drop through the tray to the next level. The start button is hard to push, a person has to hold the machine to turn it off or on.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy in Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, we used it for beef, fruits and veggies and they all came out perfect. I made 2 lbs of teriyaki steak jerky, lol it lasted 2 hours, my two boys ate it that fast and it was all gone
customer_reviews.author: A. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity but doesnt take up a lot of counter space
customer_reviews.text: Love the no fuss / simple working. Large capacity but doesnt take up a lot of counter space
customer_reviews.author: Yellowstone

customer_reviews.title: Pre-mature dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best dehydrator I have ever owned as far as quick-drying and ease of use. The problem is it broke down in about 3 months. I make a lot of jerkey, about one batch a week, but a 3 month lifespan is pretty bad, no matter how cool the product is/worx
customer_reviews.author: kelley oneal

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled that not only is there a control for temp, but it came with TWO mesh liners and TWO SOLID LINERS FOR JUICY FRUIT LIKE PINEAPPLE AND MANGO. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've used it for strawberries, blueberries, beef jerky, apples, etc. And I can leave them in a bowl on the counter for those with the munchies to grab while they wait for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dehydrator for the price! Zero problems and can run continuous without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kempton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use. I make my own jerky and dried fruits. I love this machine. I bought two of them one for me and one for my father in-law.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Owens

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Works just as I expected it to. Very happy. In spite of what Amazon says below the description, DO NOT BUY the suggested Presto Fruit Trays or Presto Mesh Trays. They do NOT fit this unit. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Wotipka

customer_reviews.title: Working well at low price
customer_reviews.text: I bough this Food Fruit Dehydrator to replace my old Ronco one. I like the variable temperature setting. The base seems to be very easy to clean. The price is relatively cheap. I already dried 10 trays of delicious figs in 2 days. I like this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan N Pham

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what it says it will
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 days just make gummy out of fruit, never crisped
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dehydrator!
customer_reviews.text: I love this food processor and I'm planning to buy at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as expected
customer_reviews.text: Useing it for drying 3d filament.it doesn't seem to get up to the temperature on the dial.I wouldn't use it for food but plastics and gel packs work fine
customer_reviews.author: man1yg33k

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Have saved much money on jerky already, which is a big snack for our family. Dryed some fresh herbs that were hard to find. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very content
customer_reviews.text: Like: easy to use (just adjust dial for desired temp) easy to clean (racks are easily removable to run under water or wipe the base) apples dried very well - tasty too! Dislike: none so far
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: the trays are extremely fragile!
customer_reviews.text: The dehydrator itself is very easy to use. The trays are another matter. They are extremely fragile and even though I used a soft bottle brush to gently clean them, they broke in my hand..now all of them are broken. :(
customer_reviews.author: Genel Wright

customer_reviews.text: It didnt work and it arrived broken from one side.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandro11

customer_reviews.title: The temperature control makes drying easy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I dry many things. Chives, fruit, herbs and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: pinky

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use. It worked so well, now I’m looking for new fruits to dehydrate!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not adequate
customer_reviews.text: I tried to dry apples and bananas and it took 3 days then I just have up
customer_reviews.author: Sava-Marie Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have used it several times and love it. The noise it makes is minimal. I only notice it when I'm right next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beef jerky machine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son - he loves it for elk season!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out in only a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD have loved this thing, but it completely shat the bed after only 3 or so months of use. Terrible product, feels like a McDonald's Happy Meal toy, and obviously does not work very well. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This dehydrator is absolutely perfect, easy to use, clean and it's quiet. I did buy the 4 year protection plan, make really good bananas, apples and strawberries. I highly recommend this product 👌 !!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gephart

customer_reviews.title: Good for drying apricots
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. Would be great if had timer but can add external one on cord if really cared.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sears

customer_reviews.title: 50% happy!
customer_reviews.text: 5Takes more time to do the job than the manual indicates.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a dehydrator. This is great for learning. And its super efficient for the cost. I made beef jerky and insantly fell in love. Only con I have is that when you get it new, it feels a little cheap. It's really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and run quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He made his venison jerky and it was delicious!!! It was quiet and very easy to clean cant wait to make fruit rolls and dried fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to dry flowers, though I wasn't so successful with doing so, it was very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: BPalulis75

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy, a cave man could do it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this product fit on a shelf very easily. You can also remove trays for more direct dehydrate. This product doesn't get TOO hot. Quick. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and also easy to clean. I have used it multiple times so far and love it! I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sintia

product_meta.title: Rosewill Countertop Portable Electric Machine Food Fruit Dehydrator
product_meta.description:
A fast & easy way to make delicious, healthy and natural snacks like banana chips, fruit roll-ups, beef jerky, and dried meats 
Great for drying vegetables & herbs. Make tea with flowers, seeds, leaves, and herb stems
Use for drying-crafts: flowers, apple wreaths, and more
Adjustable thermostat lets different foods dry at the proper temperature 
Thermostat range: 95 -155 Degrees F 
Accessories: 2 herb trays and 2 roll trays
feature_bullets: 5 Tray Capacity : BPA-Free Herb trays, roll trays and stackable trays
Adjustable thermostat: 95 to 155 Degress F, 250 Watt of drying power
A fast & easy way to make delicious, healthy and natural snacks like banana chips, fruit roll-ups, beef jerky, and dried meats
Use for drying-crafts: flowers, apple wreaths, meat and more
Bottom-mounted fan and heating element provide consistant air flow for optimum drying and no rotation needed
